explains: n. 发病率；病态；不健全
wordGroup: morbidity rate 患病率；发病率

sentences.en: In coronary disease morbidity hazard factor, what are most main are hypertension, alcoholemia, smoking.
sentences.cn: 在冠心病发病的危险因素中，最主要的是高血压、醇血症、吸烟。

sentences.en: Too few proteins lead to night blindness, perifollicular hyperkeratosis, xerophthalmia, increased morbidity and mortality in young children.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质太少会导致夜盲症，滤泡性角化过度，干眼症，幼儿发病率和死亡率增加。

sentences.en: The study appears in the journal Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report.
sentences.cn: 这项研究发表在《发病率与死亡率周报》上。
